name: Astraea's Calling
description:
Game made for 1-Bit Weekend #2 game jam

Astraea's Calling

Astraea, or the star-maiden, is the greek goddess of justice, purity, and most importantly for you... precision! Defeat waves of enemies that are taking the form of astrological symbols in this endless game with scaling difficulty. 

Go for the high score! Astraea is calling!

Click to fire laser, can also hold the click to continuously shoot. Move with "wasd" or arrow keys.

Note: Hitting continue after pausing does not pause the game, please hit "p" or "esc" to unpause the game after clicking continue. This was a last minute bug that only occurred in the webgl build not unity editor and it was submission time. Sorry about that.
